channel.title: Comments on: Securing a bicycle saddle to a bike

item.title: By: Alex
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/secure-bike-saddle/#comment-35">Richard Evans</a>.
Good to know that Richard, thanks! Will mention that in an update to the post, when I get the chance.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Richard Evans.

Good to know that Richard, thanks! Will mention that in an update to the post, when I get the chance.

item.title: By: Richard Evans
item.dc:creator: Richard Evans
item.description: If your in London Clerkenwell screws sell single lock nuts that need specific keys.
item.content:encoded: If your in London Clerkenwell screws sell single lock nuts that need specific keys.

item.title: By: Alex
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/secure-bike-saddle/#comment-33">Tommy Daisley</a>.
Thanks, not me Tommy, but like the sound of the Flying Scot Bicycle.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Tommy Daisley.

Thanks, not me Tommy, but like the sound of the Flying Scot Bicycle.

item.title: By: Tommy Daisley
item.dc:creator: Tommy Daisley
item.description: Saw this post and just wondered if you are the same Alec taylor of Flying Scot Bicycle 455k if so please get back to me , if you would like to know its history from 1962 to 1979.
item.content:encoded: Saw this post and just wondered if you are the same Alec taylor of Flying Scot Bicycle 455k if so please get back to me , if you would like to know its history from 1962 to 1979.

item.title: By: Eugenio
item.dc:creator: Eugenio
item.content:encoded:
The 2 best – secure and neatest solutions;
Combination locking saddle bolts;
http://www.sphyke.com/products/saddle-security‑2/
Or – If you dont mind carrying a key,
the smallest lock in the world;
http://www.hexlox.com/
Eug
